title: Womens Dress Cocktail
title_original: Letter Love Womens Vintage Lace Fringed Gatsby 1920s Cocktail Dress with 20s Accessories Set

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #34,456 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #193 in Women's Cocktail Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Cocktail

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the 1920s dress to be well-made and perfect for Gatsby-themed parties, with cute accessories included and excellent value for money.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST COSTUME EVER!!!
items.body: I wore this costume to a Halloween party, it was comfortable and fit very well. I’m 5,2” about 145 pounds, and ordered a medium. It fit well and was loose around the belly, which I appreciated as I had hysterectomy surgery 2 1/2 months prior. I could have went down a size otherwise, as there was plenty of room. The dress is made very well and is very beautiful. Probably better than most dance costumes, and beading and sequins stayed in tact. The accessories were absolutely perfect as well! My arms are a bit larger, and the gloves fit perfect. I was skeptical, and completely surprised when the package arrived and everything fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Erin Voca

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun 1920’s
items.body: Fit was good. Quality was better than I expected for the low cost. All the accessories were perfect. I eould buy this shsin. Read more
items.author: Tamela Ohm

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Fit
items.body: What I liked about the product is that the measurements were exact. I’m 5 foot 10 and I weigh 240 pounds and I have a large bust. I was a little, worried, the 3xl would be too big in the gut and too small around the bust. I’m a size 18L in dress and pants. However, it had just enough stretch to zip up and not be uncomfortable. I will say that the back was a little short for being a tall girl, so I had to wear capris underneath because even a little bend was showing butt cheeks. The quality was nice and got compliments. I chose not to wear the gloves that came with it. The fingers were kind of tight and I wanted to have my fingers free. The pearl bracelet did snap one of its string of beads. The headband was pretty tight, but I do have a big head. Lol I didn’t wear the tights because they’re just for the legs. I needed something to hold them up. So I purchase different ones. I also did not wear the earrings because I am allergic to trace metals but they looked solid. The long cigarette thing kept losing its pieces so I recommend glueing before using. Overall for the price, I’m still pleased with the dress it is hanging up in my closet. Read more
items.author: Arla L Negrete

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great if youre lazy like me!
items.body: Cute! I got the white with silver and it’s cute! There are strange details if you look close enough- for example the tulle was cut away like I did it, crooked and choppy but literally NO ONE is gonna notice except you (i uploaded a photo). The gloves actually fit me and we’re tight and slim! Juuuust fit my longish fingers but I didn’t wear them cause it was hot. They seem well made! but if you were any larger or had any arm strength at all then you probably couldn’t put them on. The feather headband was very cute and the pearl strand was a mandatory accessory. I didn’t know how to wear it but I saw another girl with tied pearls in a knot so I copied! The bottom of the pearls though fell off, and the separator has some rhinestones glued on upside down! Doesn’t matter cause the separate fell off too. The whole strand didn’t come off, just the end pieces, so it didn’t look too strange. The pearl bracelet was okay. I didn’t wear the earrings because they seemed a little too out of place and not era accurate (I’m not a history buff but I know my jewelry), but they might be fun to give someone. Overall, it had everything you needed, and if you’re pressed for time, or don’t want to buy all the stuff one by one, it’s a good deal! i felt I looked pretty good considering everyone at the party had other amazon dresses on too! I will say the arm hole seems to sit weird, I’m not sure if maybe you were more blessed in the chest, that it would’ve fixed that? (I’m B cup). Also I would’ve liked it to be a lot shorter but I’m not sure that’s period accurate and I’m shorter than most so it’s probably perfect on someone closer to 6ft. I’m 6’2” 110lbs size XS and I got a S 1 wasn’t too loose or too tight (20s dress should swing!) Read more
items.author: nikki! at the disco

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: I bought this for a theme party and it looked great! The quality of this dress was more than expected. It fit good and it was true to size. I recommend it! Read more
items.author: NENA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars well made
items.body: This is a beautiful, well-made flapper dress with accessories. Bright colors of blue. So suprised at the quality. Read more
items.author: simple simeon

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great dress, Terrible accessories
items.body: I love the dress that came with this, It fits very well and is very high quality. However, the gloves are cheap feeling and looking, the cigarette holder broke immediately on both ends when I took it out of the packaging and the earrings were completely missing. I tried to see on Amazon how I could get the earrings and apparently I have to return the whole product and get another package sent to me. As there is not enough time for that before Halloween, I just have to deal with it. Read more
items.author: Gabrielle Maxim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality- just as nice as a dress from the mall!
items.body: 5'6" 36C and this dress fit nearly perfectly (It was just a hint loose on top and just a hint snug on the bottom, but most dresses are on me). Ordered this as a Halloween costume, but I'm very impressed with the quality of the dress and will likely wear it without the props for a formal event. The dress itself is well made, and the beading on the dress is sequins and glass seed beads (not plastic beads or trim). The dress stretches enough to accommodate an extra ~inch around the hips or bust, but I wouldn't recommend counting on much more than an inch of stretch or you may break some of the beading threads. I was surprised to see the beading on the headband was also glass/crystal, all other jewelry was plastic beads (although nice looking plastic beads). The gloves and fishnets were ok, the cigarette was pretty cheap and the white end kept falling off. Overall, I think the value was excellent compared to what you would find at a costume shop or even if you were shopping for a stand-alone dress. Tip: - The dress is a sheath dress, so if there are certain parts of your body that you don't want to show off you may want to consider wearing a corset or spanx underneath Read more
items.author: SP

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Style 2-blue, Style 2-gold Green, Style 2-gold, Black Gold, Black Green, Blue, Style 2-beige Blue, Hot Pink, Black, Style 2-red, Style 2-white, Style 2-black Sliver, Gold Red, Black Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
